<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Makeshift Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2103) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 199 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Weapon Improviser](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=82)

**Prerequisites**
[Weapon Improviser Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2099)

</column>

---

You quickly snatch up whatever's nearby and then attack with it as an improvised weapon. You Interact to pick up a nearby object you could use as an improvised weapon. It must be located at around your chest level, such as a mug on a table, rather than an object on the floor. You then either Strike or make an [Improvised Pummel](/Feats.aspx?ID=2100) with the improvised weapon.
name: Makeshift Strike
